lead_paragraph: James Guy idolized Australian great Ian Thorpe as a boy and now Britain's 200 meters freestyle world champion hopes to inspire a new generation of swimmers when he makes his Olympic debut in Rio this August.

headline.main: Thorpe Fan Guy Aims to Leave His Own Olympic Mark
headline.print_headline: Thorpe Fan Guy Aims to Leave His Own Olympic Mark
